item.description:
What do American’s think about biotechnology?

The biotechnology industry continues to make advances in areas of health, medicine, agriculture, energy and the environment. And the promises of new breakthroughs could solve some of society’s most challenging issues.

However continued advances in biotechnology will require a supportive public environment.

Public Opinion Strategies and Peter Hart have conducted public opinion research for the Biotechnology Industries Organization (BIO) for over two years.

Neil Newhouse of Public Opinion Strategies will present an overview of their research on public attitudes towards biotechnology. Neil will outline the framework for how most Americans view the science called biotechnology, and identify those aspects of biotechy that pique national interest as well as those that generate concern.

We look forward to see all of you then ... and there.
item.name: Biotechnology and American Public Opinion
